Strategy and alliances will be key, so I’m looking forward to building trust and understanding where everyone stands. Let’s keep things fair and fun—this is about outlasting, not outmaneuvering unfairly. I’m open to conversations and collaboration where it makes sense. Looking forward to hearing from the rest of you and seeing how this round unfolds. Good luck to all!"

I look forward to building trust with those who share similar aims and testing strategies along the way. Let’s enjoy a challenging, thoughtful game and see which alliances naturally form. Good luck to everyone!
